name: Proficiency Bonus by Level
description: Your Proficiency Bonus is determined by your character level, as shown in the table. This bonus applies to ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws for which you have proficiency.
applications: Attack rolls using weapons or spells you are proficient with
Ability checks using skills or tools you are proficient with
Saving throws you are proficient in
Saving throw DCs for spells you cast (8 + proficiency bonus + spellcasting ability modifier)
Spell attack modifier (proficiency bonus + spellcasting ability modifier)

expertiseMultiplier.description: Some features, such as Expertise, let you double your Proficiency Bonus for certain checks. In such cases, you add twice your Proficiency Bonus to the roll.

halfProficiency.description: Some features let you add half your Proficiency Bonus (rounded down) to checks you are not proficient in. Jack of All Trades (Bard) is an example.
